selected_quotes: If you're interested in a critical examination of the impact of PISA in Europe, this paper is open access for January
Seeing education with one's own eyes and through #PISA lenses: our Editors pick for January. Free to download
Over 1200 downloads of Seeing education through #PISA lenses! Still free for January Must have struck a chord.
Interested in #PISA?Seeing education through PISA lenses. Free in January and watch video
